{"id":943689913,"question_id":2571,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1683101074,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/943689913/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Pivot Integer","memory":"39.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotInteger(int n) {\n\n        int pre =0, post=0;\n        int st=1, ed=n;\n        while(st<=ed){\n            \n            if(st==ed && pre==post)\n                return st;\n            \n            if(pre<=post){\n                pre+=st;\n                st++;\n            }else{\n                post+=ed;\n                ed--;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return -1;            \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-pivot-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
